Dragons's Dice Gaming Club

Welcome to the Dragon's Dice gaming club, Portishead's hottest new club for minature wargames, tabletop games and card games!
Join us for our regular weekly games nights, or sign up for one of our upcoming events!

About Us

Based out of St Mary's Church Hall in Portishead, Dragon's Dice Gaming Club runs regular gaming evenings, supporting a varetiy of tabletop games including: Warhammer 40,000; Warhammer Age of Sigmar; The Horus Heresy; Star Wars Legion; Infinity; Halo Flashpoint and many more!
In addition to table top games, Dragon's Dice Gaming Club also runs periodic events, ranging from tournaments to narrative events. Whether you a casual gamer, competative tournament player or a complete newcomer, there is an event for every level of play.

What we stand for

Dragon's Dice Gaming Club is committed to providing an inclusive safe space for tabletop games from all walks of life. We believe everyone deserves to be able to enjoy tabletop gaming, and as such we operate a zero tolerance policy to harassment and abuse in this club. Everyone is welcome at Dragon's Dice gaming - all we ask is that you treat each other with respect and have some fun rolling dice with each other.

Join Us!

In addition to our open regular gaming evenings, Dragon's Dice Gaming also offers a membership subscription - for a monthly fee of Â£3, members gain access to our monthly newsletter, get discounts on tickets for paid events, get access to our special club events, as well as being entered into our Charity Prize Draw!
If you would like to join Dragon's Dice Gaming Club as a full member, click below to fill out our entry form and get more details!
